name: Avatar
description: Initials/photo avatar with badge and group support.

use: you need a profile avatar with initials or a photo.
you want to show a status badge on an avatar.

patterns.title: Avatar group
patterns.code:
AvatarGroup.toLeft(
  children: const [
    Avatar(initials: 'JS'),
    Avatar(initials: 'AL'),
    Avatar(initials: 'RB'),
  ],
)

constructors: `Avatar` — initials avatar with optional photo provider.
`Avatar.network` — loads a network image with optional resize caching.

theming: `AvatarTheme` controls size, border radius, background, and badge defaults.
accessibility: Provide meaningful initials for screen readers.
Ensure color contrast for initials and badge indicators.
